name: Dodge the Creeps (jeff_ridgeway)
description:
Welcome to Dodge the Creeps!

WARNING: AFTER PLAYING DODGE THE CREEPS, MAKE SURE TO CLOSE THE BROWSER TAB. 

Moving your Player:
- Using the arrow keys located on your PC/Desktop, press the left, right, up, or down arrow keys to move your player.
- Press and Hold the same keys to move faster across the screen
That's it!

The goal of this game is to dodge as many enemies as you can while seeing how long you can survive! As of v1.0, this game can be played on any browser (except Safari) and on any Desktop or PC computer. Dodge the Creeps was made completing a Godot tutorial (https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/getting_started/step_by_step/your_first_game.html). However, features coming in the future will include:

- Establishing a login system (only username)
- Keeping a Scoreboard of the top five players (with their usernames) who have survived the longest amount of time
  (and  maybe their levels)
- Add increasing levels of difficulty (i.e. level 1, the mobs will be much slower but after a timed interval, their speed will
  increase to speeds never seen before as you progress to the next level! Can you survive the mob?!?!)
- Add some more colors (or maybe backgrounds) to each different level instead of the bland gray-ish background
- Migration of the game to play online on mobile devices

Enjoy the Game and thanks for playing! :)
